homeLine1: Pong 2.0 - The Power of the Returning Classic! Reborn in the Online Arena! With enhanced graphics, immersive sound effects, and online multiplayer mode, Pong now brings you face to face with other players worldwide. Battle with your friends, climb to the top of the leaderboard, and experience unforgettable moments!
homeLine2: Invite your friends and join the online Pong experience right away!
